title: Game crashes the second i press log in
body:
No error, no explanation. It just crashes as soon as i try to log in.

Why??? i played this game earlier today without a problem

replies.body:
When the client crashes after attempting to Log in, it's usually caused by a poor connection to the servers. There are many different reasons why this could be, however, our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps helped you out.

We definitely don’t want you to miss the Pool Party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)
